author: michele.mostarda
msg: MicrodataUtils renamd in MicrodataParser. Added support for error management and reporting. Improved support for itemref, added detection of loop/insideout itemprop dependencies. This commit is related to issue #157.

author: michele.mostarda
msg: Added more complex tests for Microdata itemref management. This commit fixes issue #154.

author: dpalmisano
msg: rdfa.xslt has been modified in order to handle RDFa1.1 CURIEs. This commit closed Issue143
